Class HugeInteger

  • java.lang.Object
    • HugeInteger

  • public class HugeInteger
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HugeInteger()
      No-argument constructor creates a new HugeInteger object initialize to zero.
      HugeInteger(java.lang.String value)
      This single-argument constructor creates a new HugeInteger object and initializes it to the specified value.

        static final int MAX_INT_SIZE
        See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • HugeInteger

        public HugeInteger()
        No-argument constructor creates a new HugeInteger object initialize to zero.

      • HugeInteger

        public HugeInteger(java.lang.String value)
        This single-argument constructor creates a new HugeInteger object and initializes it to the specified value.
        Parameters:
        value - a String representing a huge integer

    • Method Detail

      • getDigit

        public int getDigit(int digit)
        This method returns a digit from the the HugeInteger. Digits are labeled from 1 to MAX_INT_SIZE, with digit 1 being the least-significant digit.
        Parameters:
        digit - the digit to be returned
        Returns:
        the value of the specified digit

      • getIndex

        public int getIndex(int index)
        This method returns the digit contained in a specific index of the digitArray. The digits are indexed from 0 to MAX_INT_SIZE-1, with 0 being the most-significant digit.
        Parameters:
        index - the array index to be returned
        Returns:
        the value of digit at the specified array index

      • setDigit

        private void setDigit(int digit,
            int value)
        This method sets the value of a specified digit. This method is private as allowing external actors to directly modify individual digits is highly undesirable. Digits are labeled from 1 to MAX_INT_SIZE, with digit 1 being the least-significant digit.
        Parameters:
        digit - the digit to be modified
        value - the value digit should be set to

      • setIndex

        private void setIndex(int index,
            int value)
        This method modifies the value of the digit at the specified index. This is method is private as allowing external actors to directly modify the digitArray is highly undesirable. The digits are indexed from 0 to MAX_INT_SIZE-1, with 0 being the most-significant digit.
        Parameters:
        index - the array index to be modified
        value - the value the digit at the index is to set to

      • parse

        public void parse(java.lang.String value)
        This method converts a string representation of a huge integer into the HugeInteger format.
        Parameters:
        value - a String representing a huge integer

      • add

        public void add(HugeInteger addend)
        This mutator method adds the value of another HugeInteger to the calling HugeInteger object. If the addition results in an overflow, an error message will be printed to the terminal, but the value will not be correct.
        Parameters:
        addend - a HugeInteger to be added

      • subtract

        public void subtract(HugeInteger subtrahend)
        This mutator method subtracts the value of another HugeInteger object from the calling HugeInteger object. If the subtraction would yield a negative number, the operation is canceled and an error message is printed to the terminal.
        Parameters:
        subtrahend - a HugeInteger to be subtracted

      • isZero

        public boolean isZero()
        This method checks if the calling HugeInteger object has a value of zero.
        Returns:
        true if this HugeInteger has a value of zero, otherwise returns false

      • isEqualTo

        public boolean isEqualTo(HugeInteger argument)
        This method checks if another HugeInteger object is equivalent to the calling HugeInteger object.
        Parameters:
        argument - HugeInteger to be compared
        Returns:
        true if values are equal, otherwise returns false

      • isNotEqualTo

        public boolean isNotEqualTo(HugeInteger argument)
        This method checks if another HugeInteger object is not equivalent to the calling HugeInteger object.
        Parameters:
        argument - HugeInteger to be compared
        Returns:
        true if values are not equal, otherwise returns false

      • isGreaterThan

        public boolean isGreaterThan(HugeInteger argument)
        This method checks if the value of the calling HugeInteger is greater than the value of another.
        Parameters:
        argument - HugeInteger to be compared
        Returns:
        true if this HugeInteger is greater, otherwise returns false

      • isGreaterThanOrEqualTo

        public boolean isGreaterThanOrEqualTo(HugeInteger argument)
        This method checks if the value of the calling HugeInteger object is greater than or equal to the value of another.
        Parameters:
        argument - HugeInteger to be compared
        Returns:
        true if this HugeInteger is greater than or equal to, otherwise returns false

      • isLessThan

        public boolean isLessThan(HugeInteger argument)
        This method checks if the value of the calling HugeInteger object is less than the value of another.
        Parameters:
        argument - HugeInteger to be compared
        Returns:
        true if this HugeInteger is less than, otherwise returns false

      • isLessThanOrEqualTo

        public boolean isLessThanOrEqualTo(HugeInteger argument)
        This method checks if the value of the calling HugeInteger object is less than or equal to the value of another.
        Parameters:
        argument - HugeInteger to be compared
        Returns:
        true if this HugeInteger is less than or equal to, returns false otherwise

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        This method returns a string representation of the value of this HugeInteger.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a String representation of this HugeInteger value

      • toShortString

        public java.lang.String toShortString()
        This method returns a shortened string representation of the value of this HugeInteger. When possible, extraneous leading zeroes are not included in the string. If the value is zero, the returned string consists of a single zero.
        Returns:
        a String representation of this HugeInteger value
